Secure your AI. Control your costs.

Open-source SDK that adds security guardrails and cost tracking to your AI applications in minutes. Drop-in replacement for OpenAI, Anthropic, and Azure OpenAI clients.

Get StartedView on GitHub
100% Open Source
MIT License
5 Minute Setup
// Drop-in replacement
import { GuardedOpenAI } from 'agentguard-sdk';
const client = new GuardedOpenAI({
guardrails: ['pii-detection'],
budget: { daily: 100 }
});
✓ Secure
✓ Cost Controlled

AI Applications Have Critical Gaps

Building AI applications is easy. Securing them and controlling costs? Not so much.

Security Risks

PII leaks, prompt injections, and toxic content slip through without proper guardrails.

Cost Overruns

AI costs can spike unexpectedly. A single bug or attack can drain your budget in minutes.

Disconnected Tools

Security and cost tracking require separate tools, complex integrations, and constant maintenance.

Real Story

One developer learned this the hard way: a production bug caused their AI agent to loop infinitely, racking up $10,000 in OpenAI charges overnight. No alerts. No safeguards. Just a massive bill.

One SDK. Complete Protection.

AgentGuard wraps your AI client with security guardrails and cost controls. No architecture changes. No separate tools.

Drop-in Integration

Replace your OpenAI/Anthropic client with GuardedOpenAI/GuardedAnthropic. That's it.

Built-in Guardrails

PII detection, prompt injection prevention, content moderation - all included.

100% Open Source • MIT License

See the Difference

Add security and cost control with just a few lines of code. No architecture changes required.

Before

import OpenAI from 'openai';

const client = new OpenAI({
  apiKey: process.env.OPENAI_API_KEY,
});

const response = await client.chat.completions.create({
  model: 'gpt-4',
  messages: [{ role: 'user', content: userInput }],
});

// ❌ No security checks
// ❌ No cost tracking
// ❌ No budget limits

After

import { GuardedOpenAI } from 'agentguard-sdk';

const client = new GuardedOpenAI({
  apiKey: process.env.OPENAI_API_KEY,
  guardrails: ['pii-detection', 'prompt-injection'],
  budget: { daily: 100 },
});

const response = await client.chat.completions.create({
  model: 'gpt-4',
  messages: [{ role: 'user', content: userInput }],
});

// ✅ PII automatically detected and blocked
// ✅ Costs tracked in real-time
// ✅ Budget limits enforced

Just change OpenAI to GuardedOpenAI and add your guardrails. That's it.

Everything You Need

Comprehensive security and cost control features built into one SDK.

PII Detection

Automatically detect and block sensitive information like emails, phone numbers, SSNs, and credit cards before they reach your AI provider.

Prompt Injection Prevention

Protect against malicious prompts that try to manipulate your AI agent into revealing system prompts or executing unauthorized actions.

Content Moderation

Filter toxic language, hate speech, and inappropriate content in both user inputs and AI responses.

Real-time Cost Tracking

Track every API call with token-level precision. Know exactly how much each request costs across all AI providers.

Budget Limits

Set daily, weekly, or monthly spending limits. Automatically block requests when budgets are exceeded to prevent cost overruns.

Drop-in Integration

Replace your existing OpenAI or Anthropic client with GuardedOpenAI or GuardedAnthropic. No architecture changes required.
